docs.lead_paragraph: After three days of uneasy calm, the bitter struggle here over abortion broke out again today as scores of abortion opponents rushed the gates of a clinic and defied a Federal court order against blocking the entry. For two hours, hymn-singing protesters rushed the iron gate or threw themselves in the path of cars carrying patients to the Women's Health Care Services, one of this city's three abortion clinics that have been under seige for a month from a militant anti-abortion group, Operation Rescue.

headline.main: 98 Are Arrested as Abortion Foes Defy Judge and Block Clinic
